title: Family fear 15-year-old boy is youngest victim of Essex trailer horror
text:
The family of a 15-year-old boy fear he is the youngest victim of the people trafficking tragedy.

Relatives of Nguyễn Huy Hùng, who like many of the victims is from the impoverished Ha Tinh province, met with police and local officials after communications with him ended abruptly on October 22, the day before 39 bodies were discovered in the back of a refrigerated lorry in Grays in Essex.

His sister posted on Facebook: “On Monday evening, my brother left France for the UK and we haven’t been able to contact him since then. There has been news of 39 dead people in the container. All the chronological information matches with the time my brother set off. I hope you can help telling me how my brother...
description: The family of a 15-year-old boy fear he is the youngest victim of the people trafficking tragedy.
